files.content:
// Before adding a new tag, ensure it doesn't already exist in the array.

  "accordion",

  "avatar",
  "badge",
  "banner",
  "breadcrumb",
  "button",

  "tabs",
  "textarea",

export type RegistryTag = (typeof registryTags)[number]
